name: Frogs vs. Storks
description:
Navigate your frogs on the other side of the pond without getting eaten by the storks and collect all the goodies along the way!

But beware, this seemingly simple game gets harder fast! Before you know it, you'll be thinking your way out of desperate situations in this fun and addicting brain teaser puzzle game where each level is different every time you play it!

Don't judge this game by first levels you are about to play. It starts easy, but after some training levels and warming-up, the difficulty drastically increases; the navigation space becomes smaller as more storks with different abilities jump in.


  • 5 stages increasing in difficulty
  • Win achievements and high score
  • dozens of unique levels and hours of fun and challenge
  • Create your own levels with LEVEL EDITOR and enjoy the UNLIMITED FUN!
  • Dare to win all achievements and high-score on most challenging stages
